dc_title_s: First-level Administrative Divisions, Republic of Congo, 2015
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains the first-level administrative divisions of Republic of Congo (adm1). Level 1 divisions include regions. This layer is part of the Global Administrative Areas 2015 (v2.8) dataset.
dc_publisher_s: University of California, Berkeley. Museum of Vertebrate Zoology
dc_creator_sm: University of California, Berkeley. Museum of Vertebrate Zoology
